profile

Class ProfileViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • presenter.Window
        • profile.ProfileViewer

  • public class ProfileViewer
extends Window
    This class creates the profile viewer within the EyeView software. The page displays the profile details for a specific user including email, skype name, reviews, ratings, and biography. The ProfileViewer page is constructed differently if the user being viewed is the same as the user currently logged in.
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

      • createStarHBox

        public static javafx.scene.layout.HBox createStarHBox(int spacing,
                                      int size,
                                      int rating)
        Creates an HBox with 5 star images to display the user's rating.
        Parameters:
        spacing - width between each star image (in pixels)
        size - width/height of the star image (in pixels)
        rating - user rating to be displayed (0 to 5)
        Returns:
        HBox containing the start image row with specific rating
